hero.subtitle: AI-native Data Fabric architecture. In a single immersive studio, deliver <0>Data Integration</0>, <1>Data Governance</1>, and <2>End-to-end Lineage</2>.

integration.title: Data Integration (Zero-ETL)

analytics.title: AI Analytics (Text-to-BI)
analytics.description: Generate SQL queries and charts from natural language

pipeline.title: AI Copilot
pipeline.prompt: Join orders and products to build a wide table, then aggregate sales.
pipeline.aiReply: Spark SQL generated: LEFT JOIN orders with products, producing DWD wide table and DWS aggregation.

analytics.title: AI Analyst
analytics.prompt: Analyze East China sales trend over the past 14 days.

description.line1: Data infrastructure purpose-built for SaaS products.
description.line2: From tenant isolation to high-throughput APIs, Datapillar delivers enterprise data processing without building complex ETL pipelines.

pricing.title: Usage-based pricing, fully transparent
pricing.subtitle: Pay only for actual compute and storage. No seat limits.

plans.name: Standard
plans.description: Unified data development and governance for early-stage teams.

features.text: Native multi-tenant isolation & basic access control

plans.name: Pro
plans.description: Covers core data pipelines for fast-growing teams.

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.description: Built for enterprise-scale security, compliance, and growth.

footer.tagline: Empower data teams to build the intelligent future. Secure, scalable, and remarkably simple.

requestAccess.title: Request Early Access
requestAccess.subtitle: Datapillar makes data smarter.
requestAccess.successBody: Thanks for your interest in Datapillar. Our team will review your request and send an invite within 24 hours to
requestAccess.agreement: By submitting you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy.

presetResponses.reply: We use usage-based pricing with transparent compute and storage. Start a trial and we’ll recommend the best plan.
Click “Request Trial” to submit your details. We’ll schedule a demo and share a tailored plan.
Datapillar Studio covers integration, governance, permissions, and cost control, with AI assistance and automation.
We support tenant isolation, RBAC, audit logs, and data masking for enterprise compliance.
Supports both cloud and private deployment. Core capabilities can be composed to fit your team.

fallbackResponses: Tell me your scenario and I’ll recommend the best fit.
I can help map the best onboarding path and trial steps.
Ask away and I’ll explain based on product capabilities.
chat.initialMessage: Hi! I’m Datapillar AI Support. How can I help?
chat.title: AI Support
chat.disclaimer: AI support is for reference only. Please refer to official documentation.

steps.title: Ask in natural language
